GV03sb_06_u:418: sauśromateyasyopadadhuḥ sa ha kṣipra eva tato mamāra 6.2.1.[38]
GV03sb_06_u:420: amṛteṣṭakā iti vadantastā ha tā anṛteṣṭakā na hi tāni
GV03sb_06_u:423: utsannā vā ete paśavo yadvai kiṃcotsannamiyaṃ tasya
GV03sb_06_u:424: sarvasya pratiṣṭhā tadyatraite paśavo gatāstata enānadhi sambharāma iti na tathā
GV03sb_06_u:425: kuryādyo vā eteṣāmāvṛtaṃ ca brāhmaṇaṃ ca na vidyāttasyaita utsannāḥ syuḥ sa
GV03sb_06_u:426: etāneva pañca paśūnālabheta yāvadasya vaśaḥ syāttānhaitānprajāpatiḥ prathama ālebhe
GV03sb_06_u:433: dvayāni vai śyāmasya lomāni śuklāni ca kṛṣṇāni ca dvandvam
GV03sb_06_u:434: mithunam prajananaṃ tadasya prājāpatyaṃ rūpaṃ tūfaro bhavati tūparo hi prajāpatiḥ 6.2.2.[3]
GV03sb_06_u:436: dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca 'rtavastraya ime lokā asāvāditya
GV03sb_06_u:440: ekaviṃśo vai puruṣo daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyā
GV03sb_06_u:447: paśupuroḍāśo ya eva paśorbandhuḥ sa puroḍāśasya dvādaśakapālo dvādaśa māsāḥ
GV03sb_06_u:448: saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ kadvatyo yājyānuvākyāḥ ko hi prajāpatiḥ 6.2.2.[6]
GV03sb_06_u:452: lapsudyabhavadraso vai reto yāvānu vai rasastāvānātmā tadyadetamālabhate
GV03sb_06_u:453: tadevāgnerantam paryeti śuklo bhavati śuklaṃ hi retastūparo bhavati tūparaṃ hi reto
GV03sb_06_u:454: vāyave bhavati prāṇo vai vāyurniyutvate bhavatyudāno vai niyutaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:459: paśunādadhustathaivāsminnayametaddadhāti vāyave bhavati prāṇo vai vāyurniyutvate
GV03sb_06_u:460: bhavatyudāno vai niyutaḥ prāṇodānāvevāsminnetaddadhāti śuklo bhavati śuklo hi
GV03sb_06_u:463: saptadaśo vai saṃvatsaro dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca 'rtavaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:467: saptadaśo vai puruṣo daśa prāṇāścatvāryaṅgānyātmā pañcadaśo
GV03sb_06_u:468: grīvāḥ ṣoḍaśyaḥ śiraḥ saptadaśam puruṣaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GV03sb_06_u:473: kāma upāpta iti ha smāha māhitthiryaṃ carakāḥ prājāpatye paśāvāhuriti 6.2.2.[11]
GV03sb_06_u:477: prājāpatyāvardhaṃ haivāsya kṛtaṃ syānnārdhamatha yadvāyavyaḥ paśurbhavati
GV03sb_06_u:478: prājāpatyaḥ paśupuroḍāśastena haivaitaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtsnam prajāpatiṃ saskaroti 6.2.2.[12]
GV03sb_06_u:481: yatra devāḥ samaskurvantsa yo 'smātprāṇo madhyata udakrāmattamasminnetena
GV03sb_06_u:483: prajāpatirhyātmā dvādaśakapālo dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ
GV03sb_06_u:487: yadetena madhyataścaranti madhyato hyayamātmātha yaddhaviṣopariṣṭāccaranti ya
GV03sb_06_u:491: vapāyā eva śuklavatyau syātāmetāvadvai paśau śuklaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:492: yadvapāśuklavatyau niyutvatyau haviṣo yadeva niyutvadrūpaṃ tasyopāptyā iti 6.2.2.[15]
GV03sb_06_u:494: etasminha paśau sarveṣām paśūnāṃ rūpaṃ yattūparo
GV03sb_06_u:495: lapsudī tatpuruṣasya rūpaṃ tūparo hi lapsudī puruṣo yattūparaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:496: kesaravāṃstadaśvasya rūpaṃ tūparo hi kesaravānaśvo yadaṣṭāśaphastadgo
GV03sb_06_u:497: rūpamaṣṭāśapho hi gauratha yadasyāveriva śaphāstadave rūpaṃ yadajastadajasya
GV03sb_06_u:498: tadyadetamālabhate tena haivāsyaite sarve paśava ālabdhā bhavantyato yatamadasya
GV03sb_06_u:499: karmopakalpetaite vā pañca paśava eṣa vā prājāpatya eṣa vā niyutvatīyaḥ 6.2.2.[16]
GV03sb_06_u:502: prajāpatiṃ sa etāṃ rātrimiha vasati tadyathopatiṣṭhantamālabhetaivaṃ taditi 6.2.2.[17]
GV03sb_06_u:504: asau vai candraḥ paśustaṃ devāḥ paurṇamāsyāmālabhante
GV03sb_06_u:505: yatrainaṃ devā ālabhante tadenamālabhā iti tasmātpaurṇamāsyāṃ yadveva
GV03sb_06_u:506: paurṇamāsyām paurṇamāsī ha vāva prathamā vyuvāsa tasmādveva paurṇamāsyām 6.2.2.[18]
GV03sb_06_u:508: eṣā ha saṃvatsarasya prathamā rātriryatphālgunī paurṇamāsī
GV03sb_06_u:509: yottaraiṣottamā yā pūrvā mukhata eva tatsaṃvatsaramārabhate 6.2.2.[19]
GV03sb_06_u:511: atha paśumālabheta paurṇamāsena vā indro vṛtram
GV03sb_06_u:518: prājāpatyaṃ vā etatkarma prajāpatiṃ hyetena karmaṇārabhate 'nirukto
GV03sb_06_u:521: reto vā atra yajña upāṃśu vai retaḥ sicyate vapā paśupuroḍāśo
GV03sb_06_u:525: yadukhā prājāpatya eva tadahanprājāpatyaṃ karma karoti 6.2.2.[24]
GV03sb_06_u:530: aṣṭakā vā ukhā nidhirdvā uddhī tiraścī rāsnā taccatuścitasra
GV03sb_06_u:533: amāvāsyāyai vā adhi yajñastāyate yato yajñastāyate tato yajñaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:536: reto vā etadbhūtamātmānaṃ siñcatyukhāyāṃ yonau yaddīkṣate
GV03sb_06_u:537: tasmā etam purastāllokaṃ karoti yaddīkṣito bhavati taṃ kṛtaṃ lokamabhi jāyate
GV03sb_06_u:538: tasmādāhuḥ kṛta lokam puruṣo 'bhi jāyata iti 6.2.2.[28]
GV03sb_06_u:542: atiricyerannatha yadamāvāsyāyāṃ dīkṣitvāmāvāsyāyāṃ krīṇāti tadyāvantameva lokaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:545: yānyūrdhvāni krayādahāni kathamasya te lokā anūpahitā bhavantīti yadvā
GV03sb_06_u:546: amāvāsyāyāṃ dīkṣitvāmāvāsyāyāṃ krīṇāti tadyāvantameva lokaṃ karoti tāvatīriṣṭakā
GV03sb_06_u:547: upadadhātyatha yānyūrdhvāni krayādahāni tasminnavakāśe 'dhvaryuragniṃ cinoti kvo
GV03sb_06_u:548: hi cinuyānna ca so 'vakāśaḥ syādyāvanti vai saṃvatsarasyāhorātrāṇi tāvatya
GV03sb_06_u:549: etasyāgneriṣṭakā upa ca trayodaśo māsastrayodaśo vā eṣa māso yānyūrdhvāni
GV03sb_06_u:550: krayādahāni tadyā amūstrayodaśasya māsa iṣṭakāstābhirasya te lokā anūpahitā
GV03sb_06_u:554: tasyāmukhāṃ sambharati yā prathamāmāvāsyā tasyāṃ dīkṣata etadvai yānyeva
GV03sb_06_u:555: saṃvatsarasya prathamānyahāni tānyasya tadārabhate tāni ca tadāpnotyathātaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:558: sampadyata ityeteṣāṃ vai pañcānām paśūnāṃ caturviṃśatiḥ sāmidhenyo
GV03sb_06_u:562: sarvaṃ jagadiyamu vā agnirasyai hi sarvo 'gniścīyate yāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā
GV03sb_06_u:565: aṣṭācatvāriṃśadakṣarā vai jagatī jagatī sarvāṇi candāṃsi
GV03sb_06_u:566: sarvāṇi candāṃsi prajāpatiḥ prajāpatiragniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā tāvattadbhavati 6.2.2.[34]
GV03sb_06_u:568: sā daśākṣarā virāḍvirāḍagnirdaśa diśo diśo 'gnirdaśa prāṇāḥ prāṇā
GV03sb_06_u:572: ṛtumāpnotyṛtuḥ saṃvatsaraṃ tatsaṃvatsaramagnimāpnoti ye ca saṃvatsare kāmā atha
GV03sb_06_u:578: dvāvāghārau tatṣaṣṭiḥ sa yaḥ ṣaṣṭyāṃ kāmo 'traiva tamāpnotyatha yadato
GV03sb_06_u:584: 'ṣṭāpañcāśati kāmo 'traiva tamāpnoti vanaspatiśca vasāhomaśca tatṣaṣṭiḥ sa yaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:590: samiṣṭayajūṃṣi saṃsthāvabhṛtho nedārambhe devatā vyavasṛjāni nedyajñaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:591: saṃsthāpayānīti sa vai sameva sthāpayedetena paśuneṣṭvā
GV03sb_06_u:593: saṃsthāpayati prāṇa eṣa paśustasya yadantariyātprāṇasya tadantariyādyadu vai
GV03sb_06_u:594: prāṇasyāntariyāttata evam mriyeta tasmātsameva sthāpayedathāto vratānāmeva 6.2.2.[39]
GV03sb_06_u:595: tadāhuḥ / naitena paśuneṣṭvopari śayīta na māṃsamaśnīyānna
GV03sb_06_u:596: mithunamupeyātpūrvadīkṣā vā eṣa paśuranavakLptaṃ vai tadyaddīkṣita upari
GV03sb_06_u:597: śayīta yanmāṃsamaśnīyādyanmithunamepeyāditi netvevaiṣā dīkṣā neva hi
GV03sb_06_u:598: mekhalāsti na kṛṣṇājinamiṣṭakāṃ vā etāṃ kurute tasmādu kāmamevopari śayītaitadu
GV03sb_06_u:599: sarvamannaṃ yadate paśavastadasyātrāptamārabdham bhavati tadyāni kāni
GV03sb_06_u:600: cāmadhuno 'śanāni teṣāmasya sarveṣāṃ kāmāśanaṃ yadi labheta mithunaṃ tu
GV03sb_06_u:603: ādiṣṭadakṣiṇāṃ dadyādbrahmā vai sarvo yajñastadasya sarvo yajño bhiṣajjayito
GV03sb_06_u:604: bhavatīti na tathā kuryādiṣṭakāṃ vā etāṃ kurute tadyatheṣṭakāyāmiṣṭakāyāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:611: upāhamāyānīti keneti paśubhiriti tatheti paśviṣṭakayā ha
GV03sb_06_u:612: taduvācaiṣā vāva paśviṣṭakā yaddūrveṣṭakā tasmātprathamāyai svayamātṛṇāyā
GV03sb_06_u:615: te 'bruvan / cetayadhvameveti citimicateti vāva tadabruvannita ūrdhvamicateti teṣāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:616: cetayamānānāmindrāgnī ca viśvakarmā cāntarikṣaṃ dvitīyāṃ svayamātṛṇāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:619: upāhamāyānīti keneti digbhiriti tatheti diśyābhirha taduvāca
GV03sb_06_u:622: te 'bruvan / cetayadhvameveti citimicateti vāva tadabruvannita ūrdhvamicateti teṣāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:623: cetayamānānām parameṣṭhī divaṃ tṛtīyaṃ svayamātṛṇāṃ citimapaśyattasmāttām
GV03sb_06_u:627: lokampṛṇātmanā haiva taduvāca tasmāttṛtīyā svayamātṛṇānantarhitā lokampṛṇāyā
GV03sb_06_u:630: idaṃ sarvamabhavanyadidaṃ kiṃ ca te devāśca
GV03sb_06_u:631: 'rṣayaścābruvannimā vāva ṣaḍ devatā idaṃ sarvamabhūvannupa tajjānīta yathā
GV03sb_06_u:633: yathā vayamihāpyasāmeti teṣāṃ cetayamānānāṃ devā dvitīyāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:635: te 'bruvan / upa vayamāyāmeti keneti yadeṣu lokeṣūpeti tatheti tadyadūrdhvam
GV03sb_06_u:636: pṛthivyā arvācīnamantarikṣāttena devā upāyaṃstadeṣā dvitīyā citiratha
GV03sb_06_u:643: citimapaśyandevā eva tasyā ārṣeyamindrāgnī ca viśvakarmā ca tṛtīyāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:644: citimapaśyaṃsta eva tasyā ārṣeyamṛṣayaścaturthīṃ citimapaśyannṛṣaya eva tasyā
GV03sb_06_u:645: ārṣeyam parameṣṭhī pañcamīṃ citimapaśyatparameṣṭhyeva tasyā ārṣeyaṃ sa yo
GV03sb_06_u:646: haitadevaṃ citīnāmārṣeyaṃ vedārṣeyavatyo hāsya bandhumatyaścitayo bhavanti 6.3.1.[1]
GV03sb_06_u:652: te yadabruvan cetayadhvamiti citimicateti vāva tadabruvanyaccetayamānā
GV03sb_06_u:654: tāṃ vā etām / ekaṃ satīmaṣṭāgṛhītāmaṣṭābhiryajurbhirjuhoti tasmādiyamekā
GV03sb_06_u:660: etadvai devā abibhayuryadvai na iha rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā
GV03sb_06_u:665: prītvāthainaṃ sambharati tadyadetayā savitāram prīṇāti tasmāsāvitrāṇi tasmādvā
GV03sb_06_u:669: yādṛguai yonau retaḥ sicyate tādṛgjāyate tadyadetayā savitāraṃ reto bhūtaṃ siñcati
GV03sb_06_u:672: vāgvai srukprāṇaḥ sruvo vācā ca vai prāṇena caitadagre
GV03sb_06_u:675: yo vai sa prajāpatirāsīdeṣa sa sruvaḥ prāṇo vai sruvaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:676: prāṇaḥ prajāpatiratha yā sā vāgāsīdeṣā sā srugyoṣā vai vāgyoṣā srugatha yāstā āpa
GV03sb_06_u:679: saṃtatā hi tā āpa āyannatha yaḥ sa prajāpatistrayyā vidyayā
GV03sb_06_u:682: ime te lokā atha yaccuturthaṃ yajustrayī sā vidyā jagatī sā
GV03sb_06_u:683: bhavati jagatī sarvāṇi candāṃsi sarvāṇi candāṃsi trayī vidyātha yāni catvāryuttamāni
GV03sb_06_u:684: diśastānīme ca vai lokā diśaśca prajāpatirathaiṣā trayī vidyā 6.3.1.[12]
GV03sb_06_u:685: sa juhoti / yañjānaḥ prathamam mana iti prajāpatirvai yuñjānaḥ sa mana etasmai
GV03sb_06_u:686: karmaṇe yuṅkta tadyanmana etasmai karmaṇe 'yuṅkta tasmātprajāpatiryuñjānaḥ 6.3.1.[13]
GV03sb_06_u:692: mana evaitadetasmai karmaṇe yuṅkte na hyuyuktena
GV03sb_06_u:693: manasā kiṃ cana samprati śaknāti kartuṃ devasya savituḥ sava iti devena savitrā
GV03sb_06_u:694: prasūtā ityetatsvargyāya śaktyeti yathaitena karmaṇā svargaṃ lokamiyādevametadāha
GV03sb_06_u:697: mano vai savitā prāṇā devāḥ svaryato dhiyā divamiti
GV03sb_06_u:698: svargaṃ haināṃlokaṃ yato dhiyaitasmai karmaṇe yuyuje bṛhajjyotiḥ kariṣyata ityasau
GV03sb_06_u:699: vā ādityo bṛhajjyotireṣa u eṣo 'gniretamvete saṃskariṣyanto bhavanti savitā
GV03sb_06_u:701: yuñjate mana uta yuñjate dhiya iti /
GV03sb_06_u:703: viprā viprasyeti prajāpatirvai vipro devā viprā bṛhato vipaścita iti prajāpatirvai
GV03sb_06_u:704: bṛhanvipaścidvi hotrā dadha iti yadvā eṣa cīyate tadeṣa hotrā vidhatte cite
GV03sb_06_u:705: hyetasminhotrā adhividhīyante vayunāvidityeṣa hīdaṃ vayunamavindadeka idityeko
GV03sb_06_u:706: hyeṣa idaṃ sarvaṃ vayunamavindanmahī devasya savituḥ pariṣṭutiriti mahatī
GV03sb_06_u:711: devamanuṣyeṣu kīrtiśloko yajamānasānnena prāṇānetasmai karmaṇe yuṅkte vi śloka
GV03sb_06_u:712: etu pathyevaya syādevametadāha śṛṇvantu viśve amṛtasya putrā iti prajāpatirvā
GV03sb_06_u:713: amṛtastasya viśve devāḥ putrā ā ye dhāmāni divyāni tasthuritīme vai lokā divyāni
GV03sb_06_u:717: akurvandevā devasya mahimānamojaseti yajño vai mahimā devā devasya yajñaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:718: vīryamojasetyetadyaḥ pārthivāni vimame sa etaśa iti yadvai kiṃ cāsyāṃ tatpārthivaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:719: tadeṣa sarva vimimīte raśmibhirhyenadabhyavatanoti rajāṃsi devaḥ savitā
GV03sb_06_u:720: mahitvanetīme vai lokā rajāṃsyasāvādityo devaḥ savitā tāneṣa mahimnā vimimīte 6.3.1.[19]
GV03sb_06_u:721: deva savitaḥ prasuva yajñam prasuva yajñapatim bhagāyeti /
GV03sb_06_u:723: savitā yajño bhagastametadāha prasuva yajñam prasuva yajñapatim bhagāyeti divyo
GV03sb_06_u:724: gandharvaḥ ketapūḥ ketaṃ naḥ punātvityasau vā ādityo divyo gandharvo 'nnaṃ keto
GV03sb_06_u:725: 'nnapūrannaṃ naḥ punātvityetadvācaspatirvācaṃ naḥ svadatviti vāgvā idaṃ karma
GV03sb_06_u:726: prāṇo vācaspatiḥ prāṇo na idaṃ karma svadatvityetat 6.3.1.[20]
GV03sb_06_u:728: asau vā ādityo devaḥ savitā yadu vā eṣa
GV03sb_06_u:729: yajñiyaṃ karma praṇayati tadanārtaṃ svastyudṛcamaśnute devāvyamiti yo
GV03sb_06_u:730: devānavadityetatsakhividaṃ satrājitaṃ dhanajitaṃ svarjitamiti ya etatsarvaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:732: bṛhadgāyatravartanīti sāmāni svāheti yajūṃṣi saiṣā trayī vidyā prathamaṃ jāyate
GV03sb_06_u:733: yathaivādo 'mutrājāyataivamatha yaḥ so 'gnirasṛjyataiṣa sa yo 'ta ūrdhvamagniścīyate 6.3.1.[21]
GV03sb_06_u:736: mātrā tāvataivainametadreto bhūtaṃ siñcati tāni nava bhavanti svāhākāro navamo
GV03sb_06_u:737: nava diśo diśo 'gnirnava prāṇāḥ prāṇā agniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā
GV03sb_06_u:738: tāvataivainametadreto bhūtaṃ siñcati tāni daśa bhavantyāhutirdaśamī daśākṣarā
GV03sb_06_u:739: virāḍvirāḍagnirdaśa diśo diśo 'gnirdaśa prāṇāḥ prāṇā agniryāvānagniryāvatyasya
GV03sb_06_u:743: paśubhirimamanvicāma sa svāya rūpāyāvirbhaviṣyatīti tam paśubhiranvaicantsa
GV03sb_06_u:744: svāya rūpāyāvirabhavattasmādu haitatpaśuḥ svāya rūpāyāvirbhavati ga 6.3.1.[23]
GV03sb_06_u:745: te 'bruvan / yadyaha sarvairanveṣiṣyāmo yātayāmā anupajīvanurvā gave 'śvo
GV03sb_06_u:746: vāśvāya puruṣo vā puruṣāya īyā bhaviṣyanti yadyu asarvairasarvamanuvetsyāma iti
GV03sb_06_u:747: ta etamekam paśuṃ dvābhyām paśubhyām pratyapaśyanrāsabhaṃ goścāveśca
GV03sb_06_u:748: tadyadetamekam paśuṃ dvābhyām paśubhyām pratyapaśyaṃstasmādeṣa ekaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:751: eṣa ha vā anaddhāpuruṣo yo na devānavati na pitṝnna
GV03sb_06_u:755: pañca sampadā bhavanti pañcacitiko 'gniḥ pañca 'rtavaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_06_u:760: yoniragneryanmuñco 'gnirime paśavo na vai yonirgarbhaṃ hinastyāhiṃsāyai yonirvai
GV03sb_06_u:764: mukham pariśete sarvato yonirgarbham pariśete yonirūpametatkriyate 6.3.1.[28]
GV03sb_06_u:766: aśvaḥ prathamo 'tha rāsabho 'thāja evaṃ hyete 'nupūrvaṃ yadvai
GV03sb_06_u:767: tadaśru sakṣaritamāsīdeṣa so 'śvo 'tha yattadarasadivaiṣa rāsabho 'tha yaḥ sa kapāle
GV03sb_06_u:768: raso lipta āsīdeṣa so 'jo 'tha yattatkapālamāsīdeṣā sā mṛdyāmetadāhariṣyanto
GV03sb_06_u:769: bhavantyetebhyo vā eṣa rūpebhyo 'gre 'sṛjyata tebhya evainametajjanayati 6.3.1.[29]

GV03sb_06_u:1546: kṣatraṃ vai vaiśvānaro viḍeṣa ādityaścaruḥ kṣatraṃ ca
GV03sb_06_u:1547: tadviśaṃ ca karoti vaiśvānaram pūrvaṃ nirvapati kṣatraṃ tatkṛtvā viśe karoti 6.6.1.[8]
GV03sb_06_u:1549: ekadevatya ekasthaṃ tatkṣatramekasthāṃ śriyaṃ karoti caruritaro
GV03sb_06_u:1550: bahudevatyo bhūmā vā eṣa taṇḍulānāṃ yaccarurbhūmo eṣa devānāṃ yadādityā viśi
GV03sb_06_u:1553: śira eva vaiśvānara ātmaiṣa ādityaścaruḥ śiraśca tadātmānaṃ ca
GV03sb_06_u:1554: karoti vaiśvānaram pūrvaṃ nirvapati śirastatkṛtvātmānaṃ karoti 6.6.1.[10]
GV03sb_06_u:1556: ekamiva hi śiraścaruritaro bahudevatyo bhūmā vā eṣa taṇḍulānāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1560: prīṇātyupāṃśvetāni havīṃṣi bhavanti reto vā atra yajña upāṃśu vai retaḥ sicyate 6.6.1.[12]
GV03sb_06_u:1570: tāvataivainametadreto bhūtaṃ siñcati saptāgneḥ saptacitiko 'gniḥ sapta 'rtavaḥ

GV03sb_06_u:1574: sa juhoti / ākūtimagniṃ prayujaṃ svāhetyākūtādvā etadagre karma
